scripts.patch-tests: pnpm playwright test tests/apply_patches.spec.ts && pnpm prettier
scripts.clean-up: rm -rf test-temp && rm -rf playwright-report && rm -rf test-results && rm -rf tests/patched
scripts.test: pnpm clean-up && playwright test tests/apply_patches.spec.ts && playwright test tests/patched/**/*.spec.ts --grep-invert "Onboarding Test" && pnpm exec playwright show-report
